name: Sessions evolution
description: Observe the users' interaction on your website. Measure the sessions made by users over past months and based on the weekly pattern compare to the last observed value. If the last value is sufficiently far from the expected value, the test fails. A step-by-step guide can be found in the documentation.

constants.name: anomalyDetectionConfig
constants.description: Settings of the anomaly detection analysis

blocks.failMessage: There was an anomaly in the ${valueColumnName}
